title: Textile, mid 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk on silk
Technique: embroidery on ribbed brocaded weave
description: Dark green and brown ribbed silk (with small brocaded design) ornamented by colored embroidery in pattern of swaying stems with leaves and colored flowers.
